data.eml:eml: Biting midges of the tribe Ceratopogonini (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae) from the Middle East, with keys and descriptions of new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alwin-Kownacka, Alicja, Szadziewski, Ryszard, Szwedo, Jacek (2016): Biting midges of the tribe Ceratopogonini (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae) from the Middle East, with keys and descriptions of new species. Zootaxa 4079 (5): 551-572, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4079.5.3
